title: DataDragon
description: Transform raw data into clear, actionable insights. Built for teams that need answers, not dashboards.
longDescription:
## Transform Your Data Workflow

DataDragon watches how your team actually uses data—the exports, the manual joins, the "let me just check this in Excel" moments—and removes the friction.

### How It Works

Instead of building yet another dashboard, DataDragon focuses on the questions your team asks repeatedly. It learns the patterns, pre-computes the answers, and surfaces them before you have to search.

### Built for Reality

Most BI tools assume clean data and patient users. DataDragon assumes neither. It handles messy inputs, explains its reasoning, and gets out of the way.
features: Automatic pattern recognition across data sources

title: TableFlow
description: Streamline data entry and workflow automation. Reduce manual steps, increase clarity.
longDescription:
## Workflow Without the Work

TableFlow emerged from watching people copy-paste between systems, maintain shadow spreadsheets, and build elaborate workarounds for inflexible software.

### The Observer Approach

We don't start with a blank canvas. We watch the existing workflow, identify where data gets stuck or duplicated, and remove those friction points surgically.

### One Source of Truth

TableFlow ensures that data entered once flows to every system that needs it. No re-keying, no sync errors, no "which version is correct?" conversations.
